data.title: Nasher Sculpture Center
data.text:
2025 Nasher Prize Award Gala

Saturday, April 5, 2025

Honoring Laureate Otobong Nkanga

Matrice Ellis-Kirk and Lucilo Peña, Chairs

The Nasher Prize is awarded annually to an artist whose work has profoundly impacted sculpture. An entire season of programming inspired by the Laureate engages audiences of all ages worldwide. The festivities culminate each year with the one-of-a-kind Nasher Prize Award Gala, a celebratory evening in the Nasher Garden in honor of the Laureate.

Proceeds from the Award Gala benefit Nasher Prize programming and help sustain the year-round work undertaken by the Nasher Sculpture Center, including exhibitions, education and community initiatives, and more.

Support Nasher Prize Today

2025 Underwriting Opportunities

Presenter | $125,000

12 premium seats at the Award Gala

8 seats at the Prelude Dinner

Prominent recognition across all Nasher Prize events, communications, in the Award Gala Welcome Film, and select advertisements

Exhibitor | $100,000

10 premium seats at the Award Gala

8 seats at the Prelude Dinner

Prominent recognition across all Nasher Prize events, communications, in the Award Gala Welcome Film, and select advertisements

Leader | $75,000

8 premium seats at the Award Gala

6 seats at the Prelude Dinner

Recognition in the Award Gala Welcome Film, in select advertisements and communications

Partner | $50,000

8 seats at the Award Gala

4 seats at the Prelude Dinner

Recognition in select advertisements and communications

Advocate | $25,000

6 seats at the Award Gala

2 seats at the Prelude Dinner

Select recognition in advertisements and communications

Friend | $12,000

4 seats at the Award Gala

Select recognition in advertisements and communications

Supporter | $6,000

2 seats at the Award Gala

Underwriting opportunities and benefits may be tailored.

More Information

For more information about supporting Nasher Prize, please contact Nasher Development at [email protected] or at 214.242.5152.

Unable to attend Nasher Prize events? You can still make a 100% tax-deductible gift in support of Nasher Prize programs and the Nasher Sculpture Center's mission.
